apps.title: Formation
apps.tagLine: A Clojure / Clojurescript library for declarative data validation and transformation
apps.description: A composable data validation and transformation library for providing user-friendly messages for invalid data.

apps.title: Collaj
apps.tagLine: A Clojure / Clojurescript port of Redux
apps.description: A standalone state management system based on Redux with some customization options that make it work with Reagent.

apps.title: This Website
apps.description: I use my portfolio as a touchstone for experimenting with and comparing various front-end technologies.

apps.title: Express Outbound
apps.tagLine: An ExpressJS library that extends response mechanism.
apps.description: Enhance your ExpressJS app's middleware chain to allow access to the response before being sent out. Designed to be used for logging or enriching responses.

apps.title: Git Push It
apps.description: An open source project for playing appropriate music while pushing your code with git.

apps.title: Space Raptors
apps.tagLine: Defeat the carnivorous raptors. The universe needs you.
apps.description: A game-jam style group project primarily built over a week and a half. Most people on the team had no prior experience with either Unity3D or making games. My primary contribution was enemy AI.

apps.title: Pizza Time
apps.description: Is it ever not pizza time? Check out this clock and find out.
